About me

I've been touching code for several years. I first started programming, when i went to High School. I thought, it'd be interesting to learn C# and .NET.

Most recently, my experience has been in the insurance service industry, producing CRM system to assist in customer retention and driving sales growth. I'm looking for a position where I can grow my skils. Also, I'd like to try myself in startups. I love this idea xD.

I am looking to develop skill sets in communication and negotiation. It means, i need to gain my knowledge in English. Also, I'd like to improve my understanding of software development (SD) lifecycle and learnt methodology like Agile. I open to the learning new things.

Currently, i'm a student in the Information Security and also, i'm participating in 100DaysofCode. I study English languages. I like watching moving and reading books.
